smile.math

Class AbstractDifferentiableMultivariateFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.math.AbstractDifferentiableMultivariateFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DifferentiableMultivariateFunction, MultivariateFunction

    public abstract class AbstractDifferentiableMultivariateFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements DifferentiableMultivariateFunction
    An abstract implementation that uses finite differences to calculate the partial derivatives instead of providing them analytically.
    Author:
    Haifeng Li
